question: What is the average age of passengers who traveled in August 2024?
query:
SELECT AVG(p.age) AS average_age
FROM postgres_air.passenger p
JOIN postgres_air.boarding_pass bp ON p.passenger_id = bp.passenger_id
WHERE bp.boarding_time >= '2024-08-01' AND bp.boarding_time < '2024-09-01'
  AND p.age IS NOT NULL;
